doctitle.textblock: Strategic Environmental Research and Development Program, Scientific Advisory Board; Meeting

action.textblock: In accordance with section 10(a)(2) of the Federal Advisory Committee Act (Pub. L. 92-463), announcement is made of the following Committee meeting:
Wednesday, January 26, 1994 thru Friday, January 28, 1994. 0800 to approximately 1700.
Los Alamos National Laboratory, J. Robert Oppenheimer Study Center, Los Alamos, New Mexico.
Research and Development proposals requesting SERDP funds in excess of $1M will be reviewed.
This meeting is open to the public. Any interested person may attend, appear before, or file statements with the Scientific Advisory Board at the time and in the manner permitted by the Board.
Ms. Ann Maxwell or Mr. John Rupnik, 2200 Clarendon, suite 900, Arlington, VA 22201, 703-525-9400.

signjob.textblock: Alternate OSD Federal Register Liaison Officer, Department of Defense.
